name: Classic Cappuccino
info: A harmonious blend of expresso, steamed milk, and creamy foam.

name: Vanilla Cappuccino
info: A delightful twist with the sweetness of vanilla syrup.

name: Caramel Cappuccino
info: Rich expresso combined with the sweetness of caramel drizzle.

name: Classic Expresso
info: A strong and concentrated shot of pure expresso.

name: Double Shot Expresso
info: Double the intensity, double the flavor.

name: Expresso Macchiato
info: Expresso 'stained' with a dash of milk for a balanced sip.

name: Classic Cold Brew
info: Smooth and refreshing cold brew coffee, perfect for warm days.

name: Vanilla Cold Brew
info: Cold brew infused with the sweetness of vanilla.

name: Mocha Cold Brew
info: A delightful combination of cold brew and rich chocolate flavor.
